if (!require(stats)){
  install.packages("stats")
  library(stats)
}
centroids = t(read.csv(header = FALSE, "C:\\Users\\tarae\\OneDrive\\Documents\\PhD\\Research\\DNase-seq\\A549_chr22_final\\0"))
xVals = as.data.frame(matrix(rep(seq(1, 20, 1), dim(centroids)[2]), nrow = 20, ncol = dim(centroids)[2]))
for (i in 1:dim(centroids)[2]){
  png(paste("../H1/chr10plot1", i, ".png"))
  plot(x = xVals[,i], y = centroids[,i], ylim = c(0, 50))
  lines(smooth.spline(x = xVals[,i], y = centroids[,i], spar = 0.1))
  dev.off()}
